verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שֹׁ֭שַׁנִּים <S%H7799><s%> upon Shoshannim לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song יְדִידֹֽת׃ <S%H3039><s%> of loves רָ֘חַ֤שׁ <S%H7370><s%> is inditing לִבִּ֨י ׀ <S%H3820><s%> My heart דָּ֘בָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> matter ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> a good אֹמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> I speak אָ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> my מַעֲשַׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> of the things which I have made לְמֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> touching the king לְ֝שׁוֹנִ֗י <S%H3956><s%> my tongue עֵ֤ט ׀ <S%H5842><s%> [is] the pen סוֹפֵ֬ר <S%H5608><s%> writer מָהִֽיר׃ <S%H4106><s%> of a ready

יָפְיָפִ֡יתָ <S%H3302><s%> Thou art fairer מִבְּנֵ֬י <S%H1121><s%> than the children אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of men ה֣וּצַק <S%H3332><s%> is poured חֵ֭ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּשְׂפְתוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H8193><s%> into thy lips עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> after that בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> therefore God לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> thee for ever

חֲגֽוֹר־ <S%H2296><s%> Gird חַרְבְּךָ֣ <S%H2719><s%> thy sword עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H3409><s%> upon [thy] thigh גִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> O [most] mighty ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <S%H1935><s%> with thy glory וַהֲדָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1926><s%> and thy majesty

וַהֲדָ֬רְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H1926><s%> And in thy majesty צְלַ֬ח <S%H6743><s%> prosperously רְכַ֗ב <S%H7392><s%> ride עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> For דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> because אֱ֭מֶת <S%H571><s%> of truth וְעַנְוָה־ <S%H6037><s%> and meekness צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> [and] righteousness וְתוֹרְךָ֖ <S%H3384><s%> shall teach נוֹרָא֣וֹת <S%H3372><s%> thee terrible things יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> and thy right hand

חִצֶּ֗יךָ <S%H2671><s%> Thine arrows שְׁנ֫וּנִ֥ים <S%H8150><s%> [are] sharp עַ֭מִּים <S%H5971><s%> [whereby] the people תַּחְתֶּ֣יךָ <S%H8478><s%> under יִפְּל֑וּ <S%H5307><s%> fall בְּ֝לֵ֗ב <S%H3820><s%> in the heart אוֹיְבֵ֥י <S%H341><s%> enemies הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <S%H3678><s%> Thy throne אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God עוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [is] for ever וָעֶ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> and ever שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the sceptre מִ֝ישֹׁ֗ר <S%H4334><s%> [is] a right שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> sceptre מַלְכוּתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4438><s%> of thy kingdom

אָהַ֣בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> Thou lovest צֶּדֶק֮ <S%H6664><s%> righteousness וַתִּשְׂנָ֫א <S%H8130><s%> and hatest רֶ֥שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> wickedness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> after that מְשָׁחֲךָ֡ <S%H4886><s%> hath anointed אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> therefore God אֱ֭לֹהֶיךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God שֶׁ֥מֶן <S%H8081><s%> thee with the oil שָׂשׂ֗וֹן <S%H8342><s%> of gladness מֵֽחֲבֵרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2270><s%> above thy fellows

מֹר־ <S%H4753><s%> [smell] of myrrh וַאֲהָל֣וֹת <S%H174><s%> and aloes קְ֭צִיעוֹת <S%H7102><s%> [and] cassia כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All בִּגְדֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H899><s%> All thy garments מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הֵ֥יכְלֵי <S%H1964><s%> palaces שֵׁ֝֗ן <S%H8127><s%> out of the ivory מִנִּ֥י <S%H4482><s%> whereby שִׂמְּחֽוּךָ׃ <S%H8055><s%> they have made thee glad

בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters מְ֭לָכִים <S%H4428><s%> Kings' בְּיִקְּרוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H3368><s%> [were] among thy honourable women נִצְּבָ֥ה <S%H5324><s%> did stand שֵׁגַ֥ל <S%H7694><s%> the queen לִֽ֝ימִינְךָ֗ <S%H3225><s%> upon thy right hand בְּכֶ֣תֶם <S%H3800><s%> in gold אוֹפִֽיר׃ <S%H211><s%> of Ophir

שִׁמְעִי־ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken בַ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> O daughter וּ֭רְאִי <S%H7200><s%> and consider וְהַטִּ֣י <S%H5186><s%> and incline אָזְנֵ֑ךְ <S%H241><s%> thine ear וְשִׁכְחִ֥י <S%H7911><s%> forget עַ֝מֵּ֗ךְ <S%H5971><s%> also thine own people וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיךְ׃ <S%H1><s%> and thy father's

וְיִתְאָ֣ו <S%H183><s%> greatly desire הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So shall the king יָפְיֵ֑ךְ <S%H3308><s%> thy beauty כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he thy אֲ֝דֹנַ֗יִךְ <S%H113><s%> for he [is] thy Lord וְהִשְׁתַּֽחֲוִי־ <S%H7812><s%> and worship לֽוֹ׃

וּבַֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> And the daughter צֹ֨ר ׀ <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre בְּ֭מִנְחָה <S%H4503><s%> [shall be there] with a gift פָּנַ֥יִךְ <S%H6440><s%> thy favour יְחַלּ֗וּ <S%H2470><s%> shall intreat עֲשִׁ֣ירֵי <S%H6223><s%> [even] the rich עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> among the people

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> is all כְּבוּדָּ֣ה <S%H3520><s%> [is] all glorious בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king's פְּנִ֑ימָה <S%H6441><s%> within מִֽמִּשְׁבְּצ֖וֹת <S%H4865><s%> [is] of wrought זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold לְבוּשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H3830><s%> her clothing

לִרְקָמוֹת֮ <S%H7553><s%> in raiment of needlework תּוּבַ֪ל <S%H2986><s%> She shall be brought לַ֫מֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king בְּתוּל֣וֹת <S%H1330><s%> the virgins אַ֭חֲרֶיהָ <S%H310><s%> that follow רֵעוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H7464><s%> her companions מ֖וּבָא֣וֹת <S%H935><s%> her shall be brought לָֽךְ׃

תּ֭וּבַלְנָה <S%H2986><s%> shall they be brought בִּשְׂמָחֹ֣ת <S%H8057><s%> With gladness וָגִ֑יל <S%H1524><s%> and rejoicing תְּ֝בֹאֶ֗ינָה <S%H935><s%> they shall enter בְּהֵ֣יכַל <S%H1964><s%> palace מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> into the king's

תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> place אֲ֭בֹתֶיךָ <S%H1><s%> Instead of thy fathers יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> shall be thy children תְּשִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> whom thou mayest make לְ֝שָׂרִ֗ים <S%H8269><s%> princes בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in all the earth

אַזְכִּ֣ירָה <S%H2142><s%> to be remembered שִׁ֭מְךָ <S%H8034><s%> I will make thy name בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דֹּ֣ר <S%H1755><s%> in all וָדֹ֑ר <S%H1755><s%> generations עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> therefore shall the people יְ֝הוֹדֻ֗ךָ <S%H3034><s%> praise לְעֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> thee for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever
